help.title: Log Overview
help.information: The Log Overview respectively the XAMS Logging-System is controlled by the config.php. It is up to the System-Administrator if he wants XAMS to log several actions or not. For a company e.g. with a team of GlobalAdmins and dozens of SiteAdmins it is probably a good thing to know what the others are doing. This feature is only accessible by a GlobalAdmin.

section.head: Date (DD/MM/YYYY)
section.description: In this field you can specify for which date the log entries are displayed.

section.head: UserType
section.description: Here you can select log entries for a specific type of User (GlobalAdmin, SiteAdmin, or normal User).

section.head: Username
section.description: If you want to search for log entries of a particular user - enter his name in this field.

section.head: Resource
section.description: Here you can specify what kind of Resource the log entries are should be. At this time only XAMS is logged.

section.head: Type
section.description: Select the type of a Message.

section.head: Status
section.description: There are two possibilities for Status - OK and FAILED. The status is FAILED if a login fails.

section.head: Message
section.description: Here you can search for a part of a Message.
